content.rendered:
Hustler's University 2.0

Hustler’s University is a revolutionary education platform teaching 18+ modern wealth creation methods designed to help you gain financial freedom as soon as possible.

Learn directly from Andrew Tate, worth over $200M, and his carefully selected industry experts from the War Room.

JOIN NOW

Why Did I Create Hustler's University?

The traditional education system is broken. College and university foster the systematic enslavement of the upcoming generation by putting them in crippling debt – just to leave them with a piece of paper at the end and virtually no skills.

People are literally paying tens, if not hundreds of thousands to go to university to study ‘business’ which is taught by professors who have never even started a business in their life?

 It’s a SCAM. The need for alternative education has never been greater; education that actually teaches you how to get rich rather than being a book worm.

Why Should You Learn From Me, Andrew Tate?

The fastest way to get to where you want to be in life is to look at who is already there and learn how they did it. 

It’s not every day you meet someone worth $200M+ who is willing to teach you their life secrets, detailing every single wealth creation method they have used in intricate detail for you to emulate. 

I grew up completely broke in one of the worst towns in the UK called Luton. I worked several ‘wagie’ jobs while I was training to be a fighter. I’ve been at the bottom and know what it’s like to have absolutely nothing.

What I’m trying to say to you is you DON’T NEED a lot of money to learn how to do this and implement what I’m going to teach you. I’m proof of that!


Join Hustler's University!

Content Inside

What Do You Learn Inside HU2?

eCommerce and Amazon FBA

Learn all about eCommerce, an extremely powerful business model that can be utilized in countless different ways. Some of the skills you’ll learn include:

  • Dropshipping
  • Private Label
  • Amazon FBA 
  • Wholesaling

 

Cryptocurrency Trading

Discover the lucrative world of cryptocurrency trading from our carefully selected experts inside. I’ve made tens of millions with crypto using the insight I share inside.

Cryptocurrency has unlimited potential and can deliver enormous returns if you know what you’re doing. Join HU2 to take advantage of our network’s expertise.

Copywriting

Become a master of words and sell with ease by taking the time to learn copywriting. This is a high-income skill you can learn from scratch with no money and generate results quickly.

You can use it for selling your own services or offer your expert copywriting skills to the plethora of online businesses desperate for the high-converting copy that you will be able to write.

Freelancing

If you need income as fast as possible, we teach you to effectively do that with freelancing. This way you can work completely remotely without having to be a slave to your boss.

Once you get some experience, you can build a team and reap the benefits from other people’s work or start your own business.

Affiliate Marketing

Want to start making money ASAP but don’t have your own product or service to sell? Affiliate marketing is a great option.

Learn how to sell other people’s products in exchange for a chunky commission without having to do the work yourself. You may even have the opportunity to become an affiliate for me.

Digital Marketing Agency

Selling your own digital marketing services is one of the easiest and most rewarding businesses you can start without any prior investment or experience. 

Learn how to run Facebook, TikTok or YouTube ads and get high-paying clients with ease.

And Much More...
Get Started Now!

Your First 2 Weeks in Hustler's University |

Now
Day 1Joining the Discord and choosing your high-income skill.

Welcome to Hustler's University 2.0! 🎉

You have officially joined HU2 and have been onboarded onto our Discord server. Today is when you will discover the skills that are most suitable for you to start learning

Day 3You're just 3 days in and learned the basics of a high-income skill.

You've learned your first high-income skill! 💰

You've been stunned by the content inside and have been studying like a madman for the past couple of days. You now understand the basics of a powerful wealth creation method.

Day 7You're just a week in and you've already made your first sale!

Congrats on your first sale!

It's been an intense first week, but you managed to make your first sale at the end of it. It feels amazing! This is just the start.

Day 14You've already earned $1K. Things are getting interesting.

You made your first $1,000! 🤑

You've barely had time to breathe the week has been that intense, but you've been making sales left, right and center! It's not quite Bugatti money yet, but could it be a taste of big things to come? 

Will You Be One of The Success Stories?

The results people have been getting with Hustler’s University are completely unrivalled by any other online education platform out there today.

There isn’t another place on the internet with the amount of valuable knowledge HU2 for $49/month, let alone the dedicated expert support from our millionaire mentors.

It DOESN’T EXIST.

The question is simply whether you’re willing to learn?

Join Hustlers University For Just $49

Andrew Tate

4x Kickboxing World Champion
Kickboxer, Multi-Millionaire and Teacher inside Hustler’s University. $200M+ Net Worth.

Tristan Tate

European Kickboxing Champion
Kickboxer, International Playboy, Business Mastermind.

FAQS

What is Hustler's University 2.0?

Hustler's University is my online education platform teaching 18+ modern wealth creation methods. I'm offering you an alternative to the traditional education system.

How Much Does Hustler's University Cost?

Hustler's University is currently just $49/month, but we plan to increase this to $99/month imminently. We have 60K+ members making more than they pay every month.

Is Hustler's University a Scam?

Hustler's University is evidently not a scam. Do you really think I care about your $49 when I'm worth over $200M? If you're too arrogant to learn, it's not for you.

How Much Time Does it Take?

If you have no money, you'll have to focus on time-intensive methods. If you have money but little time, we also have methods designed specifically for that. Either way, you still need to do the work!
